entry.title: Thursday night: Clear. Low minus 32.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind east 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 this evening. Low minus 32. Wind chill minus 38 this evening and minus 44 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 2:00 PM MST Thursday 02 March 2023
